snippet.title: Spyragon Fusion - Full Gameplay
snippet.description:
Spyragon is available to play on the iOS App Store: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/spyragon/id1584715775

Spyragon is a casual puzzle game that goes beyond the traditional match-3 grid format. It's also about strategically positioning and combining matches around the hexagonal board. The game may seem simple, but mastering it is anything but.  This video displays full gameplay of Fusion mode, where the player has control over where to place new color pairs on the board.  

Directions: https://spyraverse.com/spyragon/?mode=fusion

Also follow us on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter: @spyraverse

#Spyragon #Spyraverse #gaming #mobilegames #mobilegaming #iosgames #ios #hypercasual #newgames
